text: @GavinNewsom I only know 1 person who has had coronavirus and she got it while visiting Israel. Everyone I know either don't know anyone or know of 1 person who has had it.  The people I know of said it's basically a really bad flu and weren't hospitalized. I think the rise is a total crock!
